headline: 3M Earnings Beat Wall Street Expectations. The Stock Drops Anyway.

headline: 3M beats Q4 expectations, issues in-line 2026 guidance
summary: Investing.com -- 3M Co. (NYSE: MMM) reported fourth-quarter adjusted earnings that exceeded analyst expectations, with shares falling 1.4% following the announcement.

content.title: 3M beats Q4 expectations, issues in-line 2026 guidance

headline: 3M (NYSE:MMM) Posts Better-Than-Expected Sales In Q4 CY2025
summary: Industrial conglomerate 3M (NYSE:MMM) announced better-than-expected revenue in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 5.6% year on year to $6.13 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.83 per share was 1.7% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

content.title: 3M (NYSE:MMM) Posts Better-Than-Expected Sales In Q4 CY2025
content.summary: Industrial conglomerate 3M (NYSE:MMM) announced better-than-expected revenue in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 5.6% year on year to $6.13 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.83 per share was 1.7% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Netflix amends WBD bid, ServiceNow's OpenAI deal, 3M earnings
summary: Julie Hyman and Yahoo Finance Markets and Data Editor Jared Blikre examine some of Tuesday's trending stocks, including deal updates from Netflix (NFLX) and Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD), and OpenAI (OPAI.PVT) and ServiceNow (NOW). They also look at 3M (MMM), which reported earnings. Watch the video above to learn why investors are focused on the three tickers. headline: 3M Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: 3M (NYSE:MMM) executives said the company finished 2025 with what management described as “solid results” in the fourth quarter, highlighted by organic growth of 2.2%, an operating margin of 21.1%, earnings per share of $1.83, and free cash flow conversion of more than 130%. headline: 3M Says Trump’s Greenland Tariffs Could Be a $40 Million Hit
summary: 3M's CEO said President Trump’s threatened tariffs on eight European nations could translate to a "$30 million, $40 million impact this year” for the materials maker.  CEO Bill Brown said 3M imports about $250 million of goods from Europe annually, which could be affected by duties related to Trump’s effort to claim Greenland.  The European Union has specified a range of retaliatory tariffs it could impose if Trump follows through.

content.title: 3M Says Trump’s Greenland Tariffs Could Be a $40 Million Hit
content.summary: 3M's CEO said President Trump’s threatened tariffs on eight European nations could translate to a "$30 million, $40 million impact this year” for the materials maker.  CEO Bill Brown said 3M imports about $250 million of goods from Europe annually, which could be affected by duties related to Trump’s effort to claim Greenland.  The European Union has specified a range of retaliatory tariffs it could impose if Trump follows through.
